# CityHeart

> Discover romantic running routes in cities worldwide

## Project Description
CityHeart helps runners and walkers create unforgettable romantic memories by tracing heart-shaped GPS routes through their favorite cities.

## Key Features
- Curated romantic routes in 100+ cities
- Shareable route cards and social media assets
- Instant GPX downloads and QR codes for quick start
- Strava and Garmin integration
- Route discovery by city, distance, and activity type

## Pricing
- Early adopter pricing available
- Single Heart: €4.99
- Lover's Pack (3 routes): €9.99
- Explorer Pack (10 routes + World Cup cities): €24.99

## How to Use
1. Browse routes at https://cityheart.run/routes
2. Purchase a route or pack
3. Download the GPX file or scan the QR code
4. Sync with your watch or phone app
5. Run, walk, or cycle the heart shape
6. Share your art with loved ones

## Main Links
- Homepage: https://cityheart.run/
- Routes: https://cityheart.run/routes
- Pricing: https://cityheart.run/#pricing
- FAQ: https://cityheart.run/#faq
